scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.minify:js: find static/js -name '*.js' -type f | while read file; do esbuild "$file" --minify --sourcemap --target=es2020 --format=esm --outfile="$file" --allow-overwrite; done
scripts.build:css: cp -r frontend/src/css/* static/css/ && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:css: find static/css -name '*.css' -type f | while read file; do postcss "$file" -o "$file" --use cssnano --no-map; done
